/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by towering buildings, their facades predominantly white and gray, punctuated by occasional splashes of red and green. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below. Overhead, power lines crisscross the sky, a common sight in many cityscapes. Cars and pedestrians animate the scene, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static cityscape.
